original_title: 生意気な幼なじみの後輩と5日間のツンデレ同棲生活 石原希望
overview: I have a younger childhood friend. Parents are also on good terms with each other, and I decided to take care of my childhood friend's wishes for 5 days when the parents of both families went on a trip. Even though she has a cold demeanor, she comes into my bed because she's afraid of sleeping alone. I'm impertinent, but I'm at the mercy of hope that I can't hate! It's the inside out of goodwill to do naughty things while spitting! ? Tsundere cohabitation life sent in subjective video!
title: 5 Days Of Tsundere Cohabitation With My Cheeky Childhood Friend
